xenMIB.name: xenMIB

revisions.description: The initial revision of this module.

xenMIB.contactinfo: Frank Strauss, Oliver Wellnitz TU Braunschweig Muehlenpfordtstrasse 23 38106 Braunschweig Germany Tel: +49 531 391 3283 Fax: +49 531 391 5936 E-mail: {strauss,wellnitz}@ibr.cs.tu-bs.de
xenMIB.description: Experimental MIB module for Xen Virtual Hosting.

XenDomainState.name: XenDomainState
XenDomainState.description: This data type represents the state of a Xen domain. unknown(1): No known/defined state. running(2): The domain is running on any CPU. blocked(3): The domain is blocked, e.g., waiting for I/O. paused(4): The domain has been paused. crashed(5): The domain exepectedly crashed. dying(6): The domain is in the process of going down or dying to any other reason. shutdown(7): The domain has been shutdown.

xenHostXenVersion.name: xenHostXenVersion
xenHostXenVersion.description: The version string of the Xen version running on the physical host.

xenHostTotalMemKBytes.name: xenHostTotalMemKBytes
xenHostTotalMemKBytes.description: The total amount of available memory in Kbytes on the physical host.

xenHostCPUs.name: xenHostCPUs
xenHostCPUs.description: The total number of CPUs on the physical host.

xenHostCPUMHz.name: xenHostCPUMHz
xenHostCPUMHz.description: The CPU frequency in MHz of the CPUs on the physical host.

xenDomainTable.name: xenDomainTable
xenDomainTable.description: A list of all Xen domains on the physical host.

xenDomainEntry.name: xenDomainEntry
xenDomainEntry.description: An entry describing a particular Xen domain.

xenDomainName.name: xenDomainName
xenDomainName.description: The name of the Xen domain.

xenDomainState.name: xenDomainState
xenDomainState.description: The state of the Xen domain.

xenDomainMemKBytes.name: xenDomainMemKBytes
xenDomainMemKBytes.description: The amount of memory in Kbytes currently occupied by the Xen domain.

xenDomainMaxMemKBytes.name: xenDomainMaxMemKBytes
xenDomainMaxMemKBytes.description: The total amount of memory in Kbytes assigned to the Xen domain. A value of zero denotes that there is no limit.

xenVCPUTable.name: xenVCPUTable
xenVCPUTable.description: A list of all VCPUs per Xen domain.

xenVCPUEntry.name: xenVCPUEntry
xenVCPUEntry.description: An entry describing a VCPU of a Xen domain.

xenVCPUMilliseconds.name: xenVCPUMilliseconds
xenVCPUMilliseconds.description: The number milliseconds consumed by the VCPU since the Xen domain has been set up.

xenNetworkTable.name: xenNetworkTable
xenNetworkTable.description: A list of all networks per Xen domain.

xenNetworkEntry.name: xenNetworkEntry
xenNetworkEntry.description: An entry describing a network of a Xen domain.

xenNetworkInKBytes.name: xenNetworkInKBytes
xenNetworkInKBytes.description: The number of Kbytes received on the network interface since the Xen domain has been set up.

xenNetworkInPkts.name: xenNetworkInPkts
xenNetworkInPkts.description: The number of packets received on the network interface since the Xen domain has been set up.

xenNetworkInErrors.name: xenNetworkInErrors
xenNetworkInErrors.description: The number of erroneous packets received on the network interface since the Xen domain has been set up.

xenNetworkInDiscards.name: xenNetworkInDiscards
xenNetworkInDiscards.description: The number of dropped packets received on the network interface since the Xen domain has been set up.

xenNetworkOutKBytes.name: xenNetworkOutKBytes
xenNetworkOutKBytes.description: The number of Kbytes sent on the network interface since the Xen domain has been set up.

xenNetworkOutPkts.name: xenNetworkOutPkts
xenNetworkOutPkts.description: The number of packets sent on the network interface since the Xen domain has been set up.

xenNetworkOutErrors.name: xenNetworkOutErrors
xenNetworkOutErrors.description: The number of packets that could not be sent on the network interface because of any errors since the Xen domain has been set up.

xenNetworkOutDiscards.name: xenNetworkOutDiscards
xenNetworkOutDiscards.description: The number of packets that have not been sent on the network interface even though no errors had been detected since the Xen domain has been set up.

xenCompliance.name: xenCompliance
xenCompliance.description: The compliance statement for an SNMP entity which implements the Xen MIB.

xenGeneralGroup.name: xenGeneralGroup
xenGeneralGroup.description: A collection of all Xen MIB objects.
